DOC.brief_summary: Blueberries rich flavonoid posse antioxidant anti-inflammatory property , rodent model neuro-protective . The risk develop dementia reduce people habitually consume high flavonoid intake , data human intervention study sparse . We therefore investigate whether 12 week blueberry concentrate supplementation improve cognitive function healthy elderly via increase brain activation perfusion .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Blueberry Juice Consumption Cognitive Function Healthy Older People
DOC.criteria: age 6080y Addenbrooke 's Cognitive Examination III questionnaire > 88 Consuming 5 less portion fruit per day Addenbrooke 's Cognitive Examination III questionnaire < 88 Contraindications MRI Consuming 5 portion fruit per day
